channel.title: admin on Jinliang Liu
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Jinliang Liu

item.description: I’m a physical oceanographer with an interest in understanding oceanic physical and biogeochemical processes. During my PhD, I have been using a variety of numerical tools, ranging from the NCAR large-eddy simulation (LES) model to the Coupled-Ocean-Atmsphere-Wave-Sediment Transport (COAWST) model, to explore the oceanic surface boudanry layer (OSBL) turbulence and its role in marine particle dynamics. I’m currently a graduate research assistant working with Prof. Jun-Hong Liang in the Deparment of Oceanography & Coastal Sciences at Louisia State University.
